author: Rob Reimer
text: SF Giants LF Darin Ruf batting third tonight at Chavez Ravine. I hope he proves me wrong one of these nights.

author: Rob Reimer
text: Tfg: How can EVERY investigation be a witch-hunt and everything else that happens to you be a hoax? You're a piece of 💩.

text: Bye, bye Mr. Brooks. Go Warriors!

text: Now that Johnny's case has rested, there's a therapist on the stand trashing Johnny Depp.

author: Rob Reimer
text: The Supreme Court just put out a statement that they're going to overturn Roe vs Wade. It's a warning so we aren't all shocked when they actually do it.

author: Rob Reimer
text: Giants win!

author: Rob Reimer
text: Giants Manager Gabe Kapler has much more patience with Darin Ruf than I have. .147 ba 0 hr. That's why he's the manager and I'm not.

author: Rob Reimer
text: I think Bauer got what he deserved. He took S&M too far. He did the worse thing you can do to MLB. He EMBARRASSED the league.

author: Rob Reimer
text: I'm going out on a limb here but I think Trump had someone put that live round in Alec Baldwin's gun to get even with him for the impression he did of Trump on SNL.

author: Rob Reimer
text: Alan Dershowitz, Let me ask you, do you still think abuse is an excuse? You wrote an entire book about it. You were wrong and I'd like to request that you admit it in public. Bad behavior in adulthood can be caused by child abuse or child neglect. Depp vs. Heard

author: Rob Reimer
text: Hopefully the Warriors will shoot better in the second half and the Giants will hit better in the next four innings.

author: Rob Reimer
text: Giants win! Dodgers lose! Giants move into first place in the NL West.

text: Giants Manager Gabe Kapler has more confidence in Leone than I do. He's inconsistent.

text:

Relief pitcher, Jake McGee gives up a game-tying home run and gets the win.

text: It's still hard for me to fathom how two respected journalists would write a book referring to tfg as a very stable genius.

author: Rob Reimer
text: Mohammed Bin Salman gave Jared Kushner $2 billion dollars. Mohammed Bin Salman ordered the murder of Jamal Khashoggi. Congress, he no longer has tfg to 'save his ass'.

text: I still think the Miami Dolphins should draft the Punt God from San Diego State in the third round this week. He's a weapon.

text: I'm totally attached to the Giants. When they win, my mood is good. When they lose, I'm bummed out.

text: Giants win! Giants win! Giants win! We should have won game 1 last night but the New Yorkers in the booth are tired of the Mets losing for so long!
